resources.name: Grain
resources.description: Staple food used for rations, troop upkeep, and basic cooking.

resources.name: Meat
resources.description: Hunted or farmed protein used for meals and high-value rations.

resources.name: Cattle
resources.description: Farm animal used for reliable meat supply and trade. In later systems this can also produce secondary goods (e.g., hides, milk).

resources.name: Sheep
resources.description: Farm animal used for meat and crafting materials. Often tied to safe starter economies.

resources.name: Poultry
resources.description: Farm animal used for quick, low-cost food production and camp rations.

resources.name: Goat
resources.description: Hardy livestock suited for rough climates and trade routes. Provides steady food and crafting materials.

resources.name: Deer (Game)
resources.description: Wild game source that provides meat and hides. Best gathered via hunting routes and worker camps.

resources.name: Boar (Game)
resources.description: Wild game source with higher risk. Provides meat and hides; often found near forests and swamps.

resources.name: Fish
resources.description: Coastal and river food source used in cooking and trade.

resources.name: Fruit
resources.description: Fertile-zone ingredient used in meals, preserves, and potions.

resources.name: Fresh Water
resources.description: Common water used for cooking, basic alchemy, and camps.

resources.name: Spring Water
resources.description: Cleaner water used for higher quality potions and meals.

resources.name: Timber
resources.description: Baseline wood for camps, tools, and basic logistics.

resources.name: Hardwood
resources.description: Dense wood for strong structures, staves, and wagons.

resources.name: Ancient Wood
resources.description: Rare magical wood used for high-end staves and relic crafts.

resources.name: Clay
resources.description: Staple building input for bricks, walls, and basic structures.

resources.name: Stone
resources.description: Construction material used for fortifications and crafting stations.

resources.name: Limestone
resources.description: Refined stone used for stronger structures and advanced camps.

resources.name: Copper Ore
resources.description: Early metal ore used for basic tools and components.

resources.name: Tin Ore
resources.description: Early alloying ore used for bronze-grade components.

resources.name: Iron Ore
resources.description: Core metal ore used for weapons, armor, and troop supplies.

resources.name: Mithril Ore
resources.description: High-grade ore used for elite equipment and durable components.

resources.name: Obsidian
resources.description: Volcanic glass used for sharp edges, catalysts, and ritual crafts.

resources.name: Sulfur
resources.description: Explosive and chemical reagent used in engineering and alchemy.

resources.name: Raw Gems
resources.description: Uncut gems used for jewelry and socketed upgrades.

resources.name: Mana Crystals
resources.description: Magical crystals used to power enchants and advanced reagents.

resources.name: Runestones
resources.description: Carved stones that stabilize enchantments and glyph-like effects.

resources.name: Flax
resources.description: Common fiber used for linen and early tailoring.

resources.name: Cotton
resources.description: Soft fiber used for cloth and bandage-type crafts.

resources.name: Silkweed
resources.description: Rare plant fiber used for stronger cloth and magical fabrics.

resources.name: Dye Pigments
resources.description: Color pigments used to finish cloth, banners, and cosmetics.

resources.name: Light Hide
resources.description: Common hide used for early leather gear and straps.

resources.name: Heavy Hide
resources.description: Thick hide used for durable leather armor and kits.

resources.name: Scales
resources.description: Monster scales used for high-end armor and resist gear.

resources.name: Common Herbs
resources.description: Basic medicinal herbs used for potions and food seasoning.

resources.name: Rare Herbs
resources.description: Potent herbs used for higher tier alchemy and enchanting reagents.

resources.name: Resin & Oil
resources.description: Binding oils and resins used for engineering, weapon oils, and crafting glue.

resources.name: Arcane Dust
resources.description: Basic enchanting reagent used to apply minor gear enhancements.

resources.name: Primal Essence
resources.description: Condensed essence used for strong enchants and powerful alchemy.

resources.name: Soul Shard
resources.description: Rare endgame reagent used for premium enchantments and rituals.

resources.name: Salt
resources.description: Food preservative and alchemy input; also a key trade good in arid zones.

resources.name: Peat
resources.description: Swamp fuel and soil additive used for early industry and camps.
